org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.bootstrap

Class ServerBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap

  • public class ServerBootstrap
extends Object
    HttpServer bootstrap.
    Since:
    4.4

        public final ServerBootstrap register(String uriPattern,

        Registers the given HttpRequestHandler as a default handler for URIs matching the given pattern.
        Parameters:
        uriPattern - the pattern to register the handler for.
        requestHandler - the handler.
